summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Mayfair Avenue, from Ray Street to Newell Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 186387 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
